Rows.Name: Stamina_Speed_Bonus
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Stamina_Speed_Bonus-ModifierDescription", "Increases movespeed and stamina restoration speed")

Rows.Name: FallDamage_Negate
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "FallDamage_Negate-ModifierDescription", "The effect of gravity is temporarily lessened, due to exposure to exotics.")

Rows.Name: Affliction_Overheating
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Affliction_Overheating-ModifierDescription", "Your body temperature is rising. Thirst has increased. You need to cool down.")

Rows.Name: Affliction_Heat_Overload
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Affliction_Heat_Overload-ModifierDescription", "Your internal temperature is too high. Your thirst rate has increased further, and you are taking damage. Find a way to cool down immediately.")

Rows.Name: Affliction_Cold
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Affliction_Cold-ModifierDescription", "Your core temperature is dropping. Hunger has increased. You need to warm up or find shelter.")

Rows.Name: Affliction_Hypothermia
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Affliction_Hypothermia-ModifierDescription", "Your core temperature is very low. Hunger is greatly increased, and you\'re taking damage. Find a way to warm up fast.")

Rows.Name: Affliction_Frostbite
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Affliction_Frostbite-ModifierDescription", "You have been cold for too long, and now have frostbite. This can only be healed with a heat bandage.")

Rows.Name: Affliction_Disoriented
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Affliction_Disoriented-ModifierDescription", "You are running out of oxygen ...")

Rows.Name: Affliction_Thirsty
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Affliction_Thirsty-ModifierDescription", "You are thirsty and should find water.")

Rows.Name: Affliction_Dehydrated
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Affliction_Dehydrated-ModifierDescription", "You are dehydrated. Stamina regeneration is reduced.")

Rows.Name: Test_CampfireWarmth
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Test_CampfireWarmth-ModifierDescription", "Fire is good, fire is warmth")

Rows.Name: Stamina_Speed_Buff
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Stamina_Speed_Buff-ModifierDescription", "Increases movespeed and stamina restoration rate.")

Rows.Name: Well_Rested
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Well_Rested-ModifierDescription", "You\'re well rested, and several physical attributes are improved for a period.")

Rows.Name: TempBoostFromAlcohol
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "TempBoostFromAlcohol-ModifierDescription", "Your temperature is increased for a period.")

Rows.Name: AI_Perception_Storm_Debuff
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "AI_Perception_Storm_Debuff-ModifierDescription", "Weather is making it hard to see")

Rows.Name: Wound
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Wound-ModifierDescription", "You\'re bleeding and no longer regenerating health. Use a basic bandage to stem the bleeding.")

Rows.Name: Damage_Sprained_Ankle
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Damage_Sprained_Ankle-ModifierDescription", "A sprained ankle from a fall. You will move slower.")

Rows.Name: Damage_Broken_Leg
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Damage_Broken_Leg-ModifierDescription", "You\'ve sustained a broken leg due to fall damage. You will move slowly.")

Rows.Name: MediumStorm_HeavyExposure
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "MediumStorm_HeavyExposure-ModifierDescription", "Exposure to the storm slows you significantly and hurts you.")

Rows.Name: MediumStorm_MediumExposure
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "MediumStorm_MediumExposure-ModifierDescription", "Exposure to the storm slows you noticeably.")

Rows.Name: MediumStorm_LightExposure
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "MediumStorm_LightExposure-ModifierDescription", "Exposure to the storm slows you slightly.")

Rows.Name: Pinned
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Pinned-ModifierDescription", "Your are immobilized and cannot move.")

Rows.Name: StaminaRegenOnDamageTaken
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "StaminaRegenOnDamageTaken-ModifierDescription", "Stamina regeneration boost after taking damage.")

Rows.Name: GrantedAura_ReducedOxygenConsumption
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "GrantedAura_ReducedOxygenConsumption-ModifierDescription", "Nearby allies\' oxygen consumption is reduced.")

Rows.Name: GrantedAura_AdditionalPhysicalDamageMitigation
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "GrantedAura_AdditionalPhysicalDamageMitigation-ModifierDescription", "Nearby allies receive additional physical damage resistance.")

Rows.Name: AuraEffect_AdditionalPhysicalDamageMitigation
Rows.ModifierName: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "AuraEffect_AdditionalPhysicalDamageMitigation-ModifierName", "Aura Effect: Reduced Physical Damage Taken")

Rows.Name: Spore_Poison
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Spore_Poison-ModifierDescription", "Your movement is slowed by the toxic spore.")

Rows.Name: LightStorm_LightExposure
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "LightStorm_LightExposure-ModifierDescription", "You move slightly slower due to storm exposure.")

Rows.Name: LightStorm_MediumExposure
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "LightStorm_MediumExposure-ModifierDescription", "You move noticeably slower due to storm exposure.")

Rows.Name: LightStorm_HeavyExposure
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "LightStorm_HeavyExposure-ModifierDescription", "You move significantly slower due to storm exposure.")

Rows.Name: HeavyStorm_LightExposure
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "HeavyStorm_LightExposure-ModifierDescription", "You move slightly slower due to storm exposure.")

Rows.Name: HeavyStorm_MediumExposure
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "HeavyStorm_MediumExposure-ModifierDescription", "Exposure to the storm is slowing you significantly and hurting you")

Rows.Name: HeavyStorm_HeavyExposure
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "HeavyStorm_HeavyExposure-ModifierDescription", "Exposure to the storm is slowing and hurting you significantly.")

Rows.Name: Poison_DOT
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Poison_DOT-ModifierDescription", "Slowly drains health from poisoned targets.")

Rows.Name: DeepWound
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "DeepWound-ModifierDescription", "A severe wound from a recent attack. Remains, even after death. Heal with a Suture Kit.")

Rows.Name: Infected_Wound
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Infected_Wound-ModifierDescription", "An infected wound caused by a recent attack. Counter with antibiotics. Not removed on death.")

Rows.Name: Festering_Wound
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Festering_Wound-ModifierDescription", "An extemely infected wound from an attack. Counter with anti-parasitics. Not removed on death.")

Rows.Name: Concussion
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Concussion-ModifierDescription", "A head injury, reduces crafting speed. Counter with blood thinner, or heal over time.")

Rows.Name: Contusion
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Contusion-ModifierDescription", "Minor injuries reduce your XP gain. Counter with blood thinner, heal over time, and be more careful.")

Rows.Name: Food_Poisoning
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Food_Poisoning-ModifierDescription", "The bacterial effects of spoiled food. Slowly drains health. Counter with antibiotics, or wait it out.")

Rows.Name: Dysentery
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Dysentery-ModifierDescription", "Contaminated water has given you the runs. Food nourishes you less. Counter with anti-parasitics, or wait it out.")

Rows.Name: Enfeebled
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Enfeebled-ModifierDescription", "You are feeling very weak. You desperately need to eat.")

Rows.Name: Poison
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Poison-ModifierDescription", "Venom slowly drains health. Counter with anti-venom, or wait it out.")

Rows.Name: Underground
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Underground-ModifierDescription", "In a damp, enclosed enviroment. Chance of pneumonia. Counter with a dehumidifier.")

Rows.Name: Pneumonia
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Pneumonia-ModifierDescription", "Severe infection of the lungs. Slows health and stamina regeneration. Heals over time.")

Rows.Name: Aura_Fire_Warming
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Aura_Fire_Warming-ModifierDescription", "Standing near a warm fire reduces consumption rates, and quickens regeneration.")

Rows.Name: Warm_Comfort
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Warm_Comfort-ModifierDescription", "You\'re feeling warm and cozy, reducing consumption rates and increasing regeneration.")

Rows.Name: Dehumidifier
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Dehumidifier-ModifierDescription", "Dried air gives you resistance to the effects of being underground.")

Rows.Name: Dehumidifier_Aura
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Dehumidifier_Aura-ModifierDescription", "Proximity to a dehumidifier shields you from the dampening and bacterial effects of being underground.")

Rows.Name: Frostnip
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Frostnip-ModifierDescription", "You\'re cold and at risk of frostbite. Speed and stamina regen are reduced. Counter with heat bandages.")

Rows.Name: Frostbite
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Frostbite-ModifierDescription", "You\'re freezing and suffering frostbite. Speed and stamina regen are heavily reduced. Counter with heat bandages.")

Rows.Name: Drowning
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Drowning-ModifierDescription", "Slowly taking damage due to lack of oxygen, get out of the water.")

Rows.Name: DeathRun
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "DeathRun-ModifierDescription", "Short speed and stamina boost on respawn.")

Rows.Name: Splint
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Splint-ModifierDescription", "Broken legs will heal more swiftly.")

Rows.Name: Antibiotic_Paste
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Antibiotic_Paste-ModifierDescription", "Reduces the duration of infection, and gives small health buff.")

Rows.Name: Antparasitic_Paste
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Antparasitic_Paste-ModifierDescription", "Reduces the duration of infection, and gives small health buff.")

Rows.Name: Antipoison_Paste
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Antipoison_Paste-ModifierDescription", "Reduces the duration of poisoning, and gives small health buff.")

Rows.Name: Blood_Thinning_Paste
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Blood_Thinning_Paste-ModifierDescription", "Reduces duration of concussion, gives small health buff.")

Rows.Name: Antibiotic_Tonic
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Antibiotic_Tonic-ModifierDescription", "Removes food poisoning, wound infections and pneumonia.")

Rows.Name: Antibiotic_Pill
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Antibiotic_Pill-ModifierDescription", "Protects against food poisoning, wound infections and pneumonia.")

Rows.Name: Sandworm_Poison
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Sandworm_Poison-ModifierDescription", "Slowly drains health from poisoned targets.")

Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Desert_MediumStorm_HeavyExposure-ModifierDescription", "Exposure to the storm slows you significantly, hurts you and makes overheating more likely.")

Rows.Name: Desert_MediumStorm_MediumExposure
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Desert_MediumStorm_MediumExposure-ModifierDescription", "Exposure to the storm slows you noticeably and makes overheating more likely.")

Rows.Name: Desert_MediumStorm_LightExposure
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Desert_MediumStorm_LightExposure-ModifierDescription", "Exposure to the storm slows you slightly and makes you more likely to overheat.")

Rows.Name: Desert_LightStorm_LightExposure
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Desert_LightStorm_LightExposure-ModifierDescription", "Exposure to the storm slows you slightly and makes you more likely to overheat.")

Rows.Name: Desert_LightStorm_MediumExposure
Rows.ModifierDescription: NSLOCTEXT("D_ModifierStates", "Desert_LightStorm_MediumExposure-ModifierDescription", "Exposure to the storm slows you noticeably and makes overheating more likely.")

Rows.Name: Desert_LightStorm_HeavyExposure
